properties.entry: SELECT * FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE AND MEMBER_CODE = ?
INSERT INTO MEMBER_INFO ( MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_GENDER , BIRTH_DATE , DIVISION_CODE , MEMBER_ADDRESS , CONTACT , GRADE_CODE , ACTIVE_STATUS ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET , MEMBER_NAME=? , MEMBER_GENDER=? , BIRTH_DATE=? , DIVISION_CODE=? , MEMBER_ADDRESS=? , CONTACT=? , GRADE_CODE=? , ACTIVE_STATUS=? WHERE MEMBER_CODE = ?
